languages.text: {n}Ирлиэт поднимает оружие, в ее глазах сверкает ничем не сдерживаемая ярость.{/n} "Я сделаю то, на что не решил{mf|ся|ась} элантах..."
{n}Yrliet raises her weapon, uncontained rage flashing in her eyes.{/n} "I will do what the elantach did not have the courage to do..."
languages.original_text: {n}Ирлиэт поднимает оружие, в ее глазах сверкает ничем не сдерживаемая ярость.{/n} "Я сделаю то, на что не решил{mf|ся|ась} элантах..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet raises her weapon, uncontained rage flashing in her eyes.{/n} "I will do what elantach did not have the courage do..."

{n}Yrliet raises her weapon, uncontained rage flashing in her eyes.{/n} "I will do what the elantach did not have the courage to do..."
{n}Yrliet raises her weapon, uncontained rage flashing in her eyes.{/n} "I will do what the elantach did not have the courage to do..."

languages.text: {n}Les yeux brillants de colère, Yrliet brandit son arme.{/n} « Elantach n'a pas eu le courage de le faire, alors je m'en occuperai moi-même... »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet raises her weapon, uncontained rage flashing in her eyes.{/n} "I will do what the elantach did not have the courage to do..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les yeux brillants de colère, Yrliet brandit son arme.{/n} « Elantach n'a pas eu le courage de le faire, alors je m'en occuperai moi-même... »

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特举起了武器，眼中闪烁着无法抑制的愤怒。{/n}“如果外界人没有胆量动手的话，那就由我动手吧……”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet raises her weapon, uncontained rage flashing in her eyes.{/n} "I will do what the elantach did not have the courage to do..."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特举起了武器，眼中闪烁着无法抑制的愤怒。{/n}“如果外界人没有胆量动手的话，那就由我动手吧……”

languages.text: {n}ユリエットは武器を構えた。その目は抑えきれない怒りで燃えている。{/n}「エランタにそれをする勇気がないのなら、代わりに私がやってやる…」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet raises her weapon, uncontained rage flashing in her eyes.{/n} "I will do what the elantach did not have the courage to do..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットは武器を構えた。その目は抑えきれない怒りで燃えている。{/n}「エランタにそれをする勇気がないのなら、代わりに私がやってやる…」

languages.text: {n}Yrliet hebt ihre Waffe und ihre Augen blitzen vor ungezügelter Wut.{/n} "Ich werde tun, wozu {mf|dem|der} Elantach der Mut fehlte ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet raises her weapon, uncontained rage flashing in her eyes.{/n} "I will do what the elantach did not have the courage to do..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet hebt ihre Waffe und ihre Augen blitzen vor ungezügelter Wut.{/n} "Ich werde tun, wozu {mf|dem|der} Elantach der Mut fehlte ..."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet levanta su arma y la furia se desboca en su mirada.{/n} «Haré lo que elantach no ha tenido el coraje de hacer...».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet raises her weapon, uncontained rage flashing in her eyes.{/n} "I will do what the elantach did not have the courage to do..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet levanta su arma y la furia se desboca en su mirada.{/n} «Haré lo que elantach no ha tenido el coraje de hacer...».

languages.text: {n}Kontrolden çıkmış bir hiddetle gözleri parlayan Yrliet, silahını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Elantach merhamet göstermiş olabilir ancak onun yarım bıraktığı işi ben tamamlayacağım..."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet raises her weapon, uncontained rage flashing in her eyes.{/n} "I will do what the elantach did not have the courage to do..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kontrolden çıkmış bir hiddetle gözleri parlayan Yrliet, silahını kaldırıyor.{/n} "Elantach merhamet göstermiş olabilir ancak onun yarım bıraktığı işi ben tamamlayacağım..."
